playn.core
Interface ImmediateLayer

All Superinterfaces:
Layer
All Known Subinterfaces:
ImmediateLayer.Clipped
All Known Implementing Classes:
ImmediateLayerGL, ImmediateLayerGL.Clipped
public interface ImmediateLayer
extends Layer

Represents a layer that enables direct rendering into the framebuffer. An immediate layer is constructed with a callback that is invoked every frame to render the layer directly into the framebuffer, appropriately interleaved with the rendering of all of the other layers in the scene graph.

Custom shader note: An immediate layer defaults to the shader configured by its parent, but it is possible to change that shader by calling Surface.setShader(playn.core.gl.GLShader) on the surface passed to ImmediateLayer.Renderer.render(playn.core.Surface).

See also: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Immediate_mode
